forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 3C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 39F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
